alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wadena and east central Otter Tail Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Blue Grass, or 43 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wadena, Sebeka, Verndale, Staples Airport, Bluffton, Nimrod and Aldrich. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
